text-Dari: .کار از محکم کاری عیب نمی کند
description: It is always wise to double check or take precautions; being careful never causes harm.

translation-in-English: Don't just go by what people say.
description: Be independent in thought and don't blindly follow others.

text-Dari: .دوستان شفیق بهتر از خویشان منافق اند
translation-in-English: .صادق ملگرو تر منافق خپلوانو شه دی
description: Loyal friends are better than hypocritical relatives.

text-Dari: .دو نفر یک دروغ را گفتند صد نفر باور کردند
text-pshto: .دوه کسانو دروغ وویل سل کسانو باور وکر
translation-in-English: Two people told a lie, a hundred  believed it.
description: Lies can quickly spread and be accepted as truth.

text-pshto: .هوشیار دشمن تر تاپوهه ملگری غوره دی
translation-in-English: A wise enemyy is better than a foolish friend.
description: A clever enemy may be predictable or manageable, while a foolish friend can unknownly harm you.
